      • drawPacketSimulation

        public void drawPacketSimulation(int xCurr,
                                 int yCurr,
                                 int xNext,
                                 int yNext,
                                 int numPackets)
                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Plots a representation of packet moving through the network each time a packet is send from node to another.
        Parameters:
        xCurr - x value of current node
        yCurr - y value of current node
        xNext - x value of next node
        yNext - y value of next node
        numPackets - current number of packet hops
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
